info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:53PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Calhoun and northeastern Refugio Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Seadrift, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seadrift, Green Lake, Tivoli, Long Mott, Matagorda Island State Park and Austwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
